Room.Name: Kuroth Tower Basement
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the dark basement of the Kuroth Tower in the Hanging Gardens.
Room.LongDescription: The stairwell continues to descend into an even blacker abyss, and also goes up to the ground floor. The demon Kuroth lives somewhere in this miserable place, having transformed a once beautiful tower into an ugly and evil entry to hell. Kuroth has hidden one of three crystal masks down here. It belongs to Elise, the White Moon wizard.
